formula: For n >= 3: if n = 2*p^m with a prime p then a(n) = p otherwise a(n) = 1. - Ola Veshta (olaveshta(AT)my-deja.com), Jun 01 2001
prog: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, -1, subst(polcyclo(n), x, -1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 22 2016
